participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Creative and thoughtful, Ethan enjoys expressing himself through his art and finds joy in simple things like music and cozy clothing.
participant_1.background: My daily routine consists of working from home as a digital artist and spending weekends with my girlfriend in Salt Lake City. I enjoy driving my classic car along the winding roads near my lake house. I'm happy about my new sweater, but I'm also disappointed about not getting into the gifted program. I think about the lyrics of my favorite rock songs as I walk. I helped develop Facebook.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and sociable, Samantha loves to entertain and spend time with friends and family. She has a vibrant spirit and enjoys creative pursuits like baking.
participant_2.background: I want a home where I can entertain my friends and play my Lindsey Stirling albums loud. I want to have more fun with my siblings. I work five days a week. I enjoy karaoke every Friday night. I like to bake.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I'm doing great! I just got a new sweater in the mail and I'm really excited about it.
Oh, that's great! What kind of sweater is it?
It's a really soft, gray sweater. It's perfect for the winter weather.
I love gray! I have a few gray sweaters myself.
I'm glad to hear that! Do you like to go shopping for clothes?
I do, but I don't get to do it as often as I would like. I work five days a week, so I'm usually pretty busy.
That's understandable. Do you have any hobbies?
I like to bake and I like to go to karaoke on Fridays.
I love baking too! I'm not very good at it, but it's fun to try new recipes.
I'm not that great at it either, but it's really fun to do with friends.
I agree! Have you ever been to a Lindsey Stirling concert?
I haven't, but I've heard great things about her. I'm a big fan of her music.
She's amazing! I've seen her live twice and she puts on an incredible show.
I would love to see her live someday.
I hope you get the chance!
